topic: The Entire Life of Queen Nzinga, Who Negotiated With the Portuguese While Sitting on a Servant

Section1.title: Born Beneath the Baobab
Section1.summary: You arrive in the royal court of Ndongo, where cries of power and prophecy fill the air as a future queen is born into war.

Section2.title: Lessons in a Warrior's Shadow
Section2.summary: Your father trains you not just in royal customs but in the language of warriors, blades, and cunning diplomacy.

Section3.title: A Kingdom Besieged
Section3.summary: The Portuguese press deeper into Angola, and you watch as alliances splinter and fear grows in the eyes of your people.

Section4.title: Blood, Betrayal, and the Throne
Section4.summary: Your brother ascends the throne—but mistrust blooms in his heart, and your survival begins to depend on silence and strategy.

Section5.title: The Servant Throne
Section5.summary: You enter Luanda in silk and steel, refusing to kneel before the Portuguese—so you make a throne from the back of a servant.

Section6.title: Sister, Exile, Queen
Section6.summary: Banished from court after your brother’s death, you vanish into the mountains—and reemerge with a crown forged by force.

Section7.title: The Kongo Alliance
Section7.summary: You marry strategically, ally with rebels, and offer sanctuary to the displaced—your power grows beyond Ndongo.

Section8.title: King Nzinga of Matamba
Section8.summary: You become ruler of Matamba and reshape its army, transforming a haven into a sovereign kingdom ready for war.

Section9.title: The Queen Who Fought in Chains
Section9.summary: You ride into battle with a musket in hand and shackles in memory, refusing to surrender your people or your pride.

Section10.title: Smoke Over Luanda
Section10.summary: You launch daring raids on Portuguese forts, burning their outposts and freeing enslaved villagers by the hundreds.

Section11.title: The Art of Delay
Section11.summary: You stretch time like a bowstring—playing envoys, priests, and soldiers against each other as you plan your final moves.

Section12.title: A Queen and Her Ghosts
Section12.summary: In the twilight of war, you whisper to ancestors, asking if peace is a wound or a gift yet to be unwrapped.

Section13.title: The Final Accord
Section13.summary: You negotiate once more with the Portuguese, older now, but unbowed—offering them peace, but on your terms alone.

Section14.title: The Last Breath of Nzinga
Section14.summary: Your life closes in quiet dignity, surrounded by loyal warriors and silent hopes for a future beyond chains.

Section15.title: The Throne Remembered
Section15.summary: Long after your death, stories of your rule ripple across continents—etched in memory, and in the unbent backs of the free.
